snippet.title: Reinforcement Learning: An Introduction
snippet.description: The discussion ranges from the history of the field's intellectual foundations to recent developments and applications. Areas studied include reinforcement learning problems in terms of Markov decision problems and solution methods.

snippet.title: Algorithms for Reinforcement Learning
snippet.description: In this book, we focus on those algorithms of reinforcement learning that build on the powerful theory of dynamic programming.We give a fairly comprehensive catalog of learning problems, describe the core ideas, note a large number of state ...

snippet.title: Reinforcement Learning: State-of-the-Art
snippet.description: As a field, reinforcement learning has progressed tremendously in the past decade.The main goal of this book is to present an up-to-date series of survey articles on the main contemporary sub-fields of reinforcement learning.

snippet.title: Motivated Reinforcement Learning: Curious Characters for ...
snippet.description: This book covers the design, evaluation and application of computational models of motivation in reinforcement learning.

snippet.title: Adaptive Representations for Reinforcement Learning
snippet.description: This book presents new algorithms for reinforcement learning, a form of machine learning in which an autonomous agent seeks a control policy for a sequential decision task.

snippet.title: Qualitative Spatial Abstraction in Reinforcement Learning
snippet.description: In this book the author investigates whether deficiencies of reinforcement learning can be overcome by suitable abstraction methods.

snippet.title: Recent Advances in Reinforcement Learning
snippet.description: This book is a collection of important papers that address topics including the theoretical foundations of dynamic programming approaches, the role of prior knowledge, and methods for improving performance of reinforcement-learning ...

snippet.title: Review on use of Reinforcement Learning in Artificial ...
snippet.description: Human started making machinery that can do the job for them.

snippet.title: Transfer in Reinforcement Learning Domains
snippet.description: This book provides an introduction to the RL transfer problem and discusses methods which demonstrate the promise of this exciting area of research.

snippet.title: Reinforcement Learning for Adaptive Dialogue Systems: A ...
snippet.description: This work provides insights, lessons, and inspiration for future research and development not only for spoken dialogue systems in particular, but for data-driven approaches to human-machine interaction in general.
